text:
Fixed in revision 575297.

It's a hack, though. The underlying problem is that the revisions have to be
copied from authoring to archive, resulting in an increased revision number of
the archived document without having committed a session.

In 1.2 we had shared revision files for all area versions, this has changed with
the new generic repository implementation. Maybe we could re-introduce this
concept once, or abandon areas entirely.
